mapper.select: SELECT bal.code AS code, bal.name AS name, bd.department_name AS departmentName, bal.opt_object AS optObject, bal.description AS description, bal.opt_time AS optTime FROM basicinfo_action_log AS bal, permission_user AS pu, basicinfo_department AS bd WHERE (bal.opt_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) AND (bal.user_code = pu.code) AND ((pu.department_code = bd.code) OR ((pu.deparment_code IS NULL) AND (bd.code IS NULL)))
